attributes.title: Absolute garbage
attributes.review: This app is so bad that I almost had a heart attack from looking at the orange mans face I now have ptsd from the horror of this app. Absolute garbage

attributes.title: Absolute garbage
attributes.review: It made so many promises but in the end I was left disappointed

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted something to burn but it turns out the clothes burned my eyes first
As soon as I open this app I get horrific photos and some of my friends say there are viruses 🦠✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿ps black lives matter.

attributes.title: Took my chipotle reward points 🥺
attributes.review: Say this app leaked my address, phone number, social security, nudes, and my Chipotle rewards points. 😤😤

attributes.title: This app is disgusting
attributes.review: OMG. the second i opened the app i was greeted with donald trump MAKING OUT with his DOG!!! Donald this is absolutely horrendous 🤮🤮this app should get off the app store immediately!!!

attributes.title: Ugly Cheeto
attributes.review: I hate this app because all it talks about is some orange guy. He looks very unhealthy and always talks about him self. Please stop talking about this Cheeto man.

attributes.title: Horrible app👎
